name: Made to Order: The Party Game
description: The world's #1 food-stacking themed memory-based party game*! Strain your brain to remember peculiar orders of your patrons and deal with Difficult Customers! Enjoy Party Mode with a group of 8 friends or go for the high score in solo mode! *Maybe.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 7800 GT or ATI Radeon™ HD 3000+ or better Storage: 240 MB available space
